ovdesc.p: This application is designed to interface the host machine to DOS files via various terminal emulation protocols.
The files and records on the host machine must be standard flat ASCII files, that is hashed files and or records cannot be transferred.
The only functions allowed in this application are:
L - List V - Verity P - Print R - Reverse S - See C - Copy I - Input
